targets.expr: count(count by (name) (drbd_connection_state{drbd_connection_state!="UpToDate", drbd_connection_state!="Connected", node=~"$node"} == 1)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: DRBD data out of sync with a peer
panels.title: out-of-sync

panels.description: DRBD data out of sync with a peer

targets.expr: sum(max by(name, volume) (drbd_peerdevice_outofsync_bytes > 0)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: out-of-sync data
